pull.title: DEPENDENT: API: Expose bitcoinconsensus_verify_header() in libconsensus
pull.body:
To extend libconsensus' functionality, I propose to add `bitcoinconsensus_verify_header()` the partial checks `CheckBlockHeader()` and `ContextualCheckBlockHeader` could be exposed as well.

Unlike VerifyScript, VerifyBlockHeader depends on the nodes storage, as it requires data from the blockchain previous to the header being verified. How to exactly interface that data with VerifyBlockHeader can be a delicate matter and it should be of course open to discussion. Here there's just one proposal.

The offending dependency is CBlockIndex in chain.o, specially CBlockIndex::pprev which is a pointer to another object. All the other dependencies unacceptable for libconsensus have been removed first, to make things easier for someone who wants to propose to solve that final problem in some other way.

Dependencies:
-MOVEONLY: Move most consensus function declarations to consensus/consensus.h #6048
-Consensus: Refactor: Consensus version of CheckBlockHeader() #6035
-Separate CValidationState from main #5669
-Chainparams: Refactor: Decouple IsSuperMajority from Params() #5968
-Consensus: Decouple ContextualCheckBlockHeader from checkpoints #5975
-Consensus: Turn CBlockIndex::GetMedianTimePast into independent function #6009
-Consensus: Consensus version of pow functions #6037

rename.from: DEPENDENT: Consensus: API: Expose bitcoinconsensus_verify_header() in libconsensus
rename.to: DEPENDENT: API: Expose bitcoinconsensus_verify_header() in libconsensus

events.message: Consensus: Consensus version of pow functions
Consensus: Refactor: Consensus version of CheckBlockHeader()
Chainparams: Refactor: Decouple IsSuperMajority from Params()
Consensus: Create consensus/consensus.h with some constants
Consensus: Refactor: Decouple CValidationState from main::AbortNode()
Consensus: Refactor: Turn CBlockIndex::GetMedianTimePast into independent function
Consensus: Refactor: Consensus version of ContextualCheckBlockHeader()
Consensus: MOVEONLY: Move CValidationState from main consensus/validation

Consensus: MOVEONLY: Move to blockverify.cpp:

from main.cpp:
-CheckBlockHeader
-ContextualCheckBlockHeader
-IsSuperMajority

from pow.cpp:
-CalculateNextWorkRequired
-CheckProofOfWork
-GetNextWorkRequired
Consensus: Cleanup: Destroy pow.o and move GetBlockProof(CBlockIndex) to chain.o
Consensus: API: Expose bitcoinconsensus_verify_header() in libconsensus

events.body:
I realized this is mostly unreadable until something similar to #6048 is merged.
I will close this for now but I will still maintain the list of dependencies.

This looks strange/ugly, you could IMHO let clang-format cleanup this pull :)?
Block can never be NULL here?
Function name changed, now `GetNextWorkRequiredLog`, perhaps use **func**?

This is from a moveonly commit in #5669 
Hopefully we will do clang-format project wise for 0.11. @laanwj what were the requirements for that to happen?

comments.body: Feel free to suggest something. Probably better to comment in the smaller PRs for now as this branch will likely require more rebases and force pushes. In this case, the relevant PR is #6009
This is a move-only commit as well.

I don't undesrtand what you mean. There's two functions with this, one for miner and one for everyone else. I'm happy to remove the miner version if it's fine to remove the logging there.
Anyway, I will create a smaller PR only adapting the pow functions to consensus.
